member.name: T:PlusLog.LogHelper
member.summary: This class contains the methods to access the different loggers supported by the PlusLog library.

member.name: M:PlusLog.LogHelper.GetFileLogger
member.summary: This method creates an instance of the FileLogger class.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the FileLogger class.

member.name: M:PlusLog.LogHelper.GetDbLogger(System.String)
member.summary: This method creates an instance of the DbLogger class.
member.param: The name of the connection used for the Database Logger.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the DbLogger class.

member.name: M:PlusLog.LogHelper.GetMailLogger
member.summary: This method creates an instance of the MailLogger class.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the MailLogger class.
